name: My Sunshine
description:
A day like any other in the park.
Short narrative experience.

This game is about doing certain actions repeatedly. Just like in real life.
In fact it's just a slow paced game about parenthood.

Use mouse and keyboard.
And turn on the sound.

Also please excuse the roughness around the edges - the game was made in a very short time for #AsylumJam2017 and 1+1=3 Jam.
The themes of the jams were: "Zero sum - one person's win is another's loss" and "winter".

AsylumJam is a game jam that is about creating horror experience without negative portrayal of mental health, medical professionals or medical institutes.

1+1=3 jam is all about adding 1+1 to get 3. In other words, to make a game that prominently features a mixture of separate game mechanics or elements.

Let me know what you think about the game. And if you're stuck or anything just ask I'll be glad to help!
